attributes.action: renationalise the railways, but under the control of the French government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The French take pride in their railways, providing a fast and efficient service, something our governments hold no interest in.  They certainly wouldn't do a worse job than the current owners do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
